DOC.brief_summary: After 2 week run-in period , subject randomize either IQP-CL-101 match placebo . Over 8 week , subject monitor improvement IBS symptom
DOC.criteria: Fulfils RomeIII criterion IBS diagnosis Females ' agreement use appropriate birth control method active study period female childbearing potential Subject declares write his/her consent participate , understand requirement study willing comply Known sensitivity ingredient IQPCL101 Clinically relevant abnormality colonoscopy within last 2 year prior randomization Other cause IBS symptom inflammatory bowel disease ( IBD ) , microscopic colitis , celiac disease , history abdominal obstruction , cholecystitis , pancreatitis , ileus , gastrointestinal bleeding Use medication could influence GI function ( e.g . antibiotic , laxative , opioids , glucocorticoid , anticholinergic , antidiarrheal ) within 1 month prior randomization Clinically relevant excursion safety parameter Any condition deem relevant investigator ( )
